events.description: Order changes relating to a token pair
Order changes related to an account address
Notifications related to an account address
Taker events related to a token pair
Taker events related to an address

Order.description: An order that has been recorded on the ERC dEX Order Book

dateClosed.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

networkId.description: ID of the Ethereum network the order is associated with

expirationUnixTimestampSec.description: Unix timestamp of order expiration (in seconds)

makerFee.description: Fee due from maker on order fill

makerTokenAddress.description: Token address of the maker token

makerTokenAmount.description: Total amount of maker token in order

serializedEcSignature.description: Serialized version of the EC signature for signed orders

taker.description: Taker address; generally a null taker

takerFee.description: Fee due from taker on order fill

takerTokenAddress.description: Token address of the taker token

takerTokenAmount.description: Total amount of taker token in order

remainingTakerTokenAmount.description: Remaining amount in the order in terms of taker token units

orderHash.description: The hash of the signed order

state.description:
State of the order: Open (0), Canceled (1),
Filled (2), Expired(3), Removed(4),
PendingCancel (5)

dateCreated.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

dateUpdated.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

taker.description: Address of the order taker

txHash.description: Associated transaction hash of fill event

state.description: State of the event: Pending(0), Complete (1), Failed (2)

Notification.description: A notification meant for consumption by clients

Order.description: An order that has been recorded on the ERC dEX Order Book

dateClosed.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

networkId.description: ID of the Ethereum network the order is associated with

expirationUnixTimestampSec.description: Unix timestamp of order expiration (in seconds)

makerFee.description: Fee due from maker on order fill

makerTokenAddress.description: Token address of the maker token

makerTokenAmount.description: Total amount of maker token in order

serializedEcSignature.description: Serialized version of the EC signature for signed orders

taker.description: Taker address; generally a null taker

takerFee.description: Fee due from taker on order fill

takerTokenAddress.description: Token address of the taker token

takerTokenAmount.description: Total amount of taker token in order

remainingTakerTokenAmount.description: Remaining amount in the order in terms of taker token units

orderHash.description: The hash of the signed order

state.description:
State of the order: Open (0), Canceled (1),
Filled (2), Expired(3), Removed(4),
PendingCancel (5)

taker.description: Address of the order taker

txHash.description: Associated transaction hash of fill event

state.description: State of the event: Pending(0), Complete (1), Failed (2)
